properties.Name: Romney
properties.Note: Erupting volcano. Height: 4761 m.

properties.Name: Hot Springs of Atopkoy
properties.Note: A geothermal springs with naturally heated water that provide relaxation and medicinal benefits. Average temperature is 25Â°C.

properties.Name: Kormansuze Enchanted Reservoir
properties.Note: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.Name: Altazopuz â€” silver mining town
properties.Note: Altazopuz is a mining town of 10010 people just nearby the silver mine.

properties.Name: Elenlerkor â€” salt mining town
properties.Note: Elenlerkor is a mining town of 9535 people just nearby the salt mine.

properties.Name: Aslankaka â€” silver mining town
properties.Note: Aslankaka is a mining town of 11273 people just nearby the silver mine.

properties.Name: Shiz â€” silver mining town
properties.Note: Shiz is a mining town of 982 people just nearby the silver mine.

properties.Name: Zarabilgab â€” lead mining town
properties.Note: Zarabilgab is a mining town of 4773 people just nearby the lead mine.

properties.Name: Yelkadale â€” iron mining town
properties.Note: Yelkadale is a mining town of 1528 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.Name: Orbeyaykut â€” iron mining town
properties.Note: Orbeyaykut is a mining town of 1250 people just nearby the iron mine.

properties.Name: Baberende Bridge
properties.Note: A weathered bridge spans over the Steamhand River near Baberende.

properties.Name: The Beautiful Inn
properties.Note: A big and famous roadside inn. Delicious dry-aged cake with white kvass is served here.

properties.Name: The Pink Horse
properties.Note: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious marinated horse with sweet milk is served here.

properties.Name: The Prime Lark
properties.Note: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious stuffed lark with sour tequila is served here.

properties.Name: The Favorable Tavern
properties.Note: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious steamed garlic with smelly nectar is served here.

properties.Name: The Fair Lark
properties.Note: A big and famous roadside tavern. Delicious jugged quail with bitter cider is served here.

properties.Name: Elseguard Lighthouse
properties.Note: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.Name: Scorchilldean Lighthouse
properties.Note: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.Name: Smootwatch Lighthouse
properties.Note: A lighthouse to serve as a beacon for ships in the open sea.

properties.Name: Southgulch Battlefield
properties.Note:
A historical battle of the Sarpselian Expedition. 
Date: October 1, 327 Szok'su Era.

properties.Name: Shaleneld Battlefield
properties.Note:
A historical battle of the Skaphris Invasion. 
Date: June 30, 1998 Szok'su Era.

properties.Name: Buyayramde Battlefield
properties.Note:
A historical battle of the Skaphris Invasion. 
Date: April 10, 145 Szok'su Era.

properties.Name: Dungeon
properties.Note: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.Name: Dungeon
properties.Note: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.Name: Dungeon
properties.Note: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.Name: Dungeon
properties.Note: Undiscovered dungeon. See One page dungeon

properties.Name: Khiz Monster
properties.Note: Locals say a relic monster of 10 m long inhabits Khiz Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Dewgrasp Monster
properties.Note: Tales say a relic monster of 9 m long inhabits Dewgrasp Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Asla Monster
properties.Note: Elders say a relic monster of 17 m long inhabits Asla Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Smootmore Monster
properties.Note: Legends say a relic monster of 7 m long inhabits Smootmore Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Nanuraram Monster
properties.Note: Locals say a relic monster of 23 m long inhabits Nanuraram Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Yaboy Monster
properties.Note: Whispers say a relic monster of 6 m long inhabits Yaboy Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Amburnwell Monster
properties.Note: Whispers say a relic monster of 16 m long inhabits Amburnwell Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Duvazoguz Monster
properties.Note: Whispers say a relic monster of 15 m long inhabits Duvazoguz Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Edbaymouth Monster
properties.Note: Rumors say a relic monster of 8 m long inhabits Edbaymouth Lake. Truth or lie, folks are afraid to fish in the lake.

properties.Name: Magelton Monster
properties.Note: Old sailors tell stories of a gigantic sea monster inhabiting these dangerous waters. Rumors say it can be 16 m long.

properties.Name: Akayayada Bearded Devil
properties.Note: Tipplers speak of a horrifying Bearded Devil who inhabits Akayayada hills and prefers eating children.

properties.Name: Boyvarli Undead
properties.Note: Locals speak of a lucky Undead who inhabits Boyvarli hills and keeps the region at bay.

properties.Name: Yayantay Ghoul
properties.Note: Whispers speak of a magical Ghoul who inhabits Yayantay hills and eats kids whole.

properties.Name: Grinepond Forest
properties.Note: A forest sacred to local Cloudwodism.

properties.Name: Curdeneld Pinery
properties.Note: A pinery sacred to local Anor (Human) Forefathers.

properties.Name: Vulakse Palm Grove
properties.Note: A palm grove sacred to local Rohand (Human) Shamanism.

properties.Name: Snakenbell Badgers
properties.Note: A gang of forest robbers.

properties.Name: Faveneldge Foxes
properties.Note: A gang of forest brigands.

properties.Name: Deadwood Dogs
properties.Note: A gang of mounted brigands.

properties.Name: Pirates
properties.Note: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.Name: Pirates
properties.Note: Pirate ships have been spotted in these waters.

properties.Name: Ruined Outpost
properties.Note: Ruins of an ancient outpost. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.Name: Ruined Town
properties.Note: Ruins of an ancient town. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.Name: Ruined Temple
properties.Note: Ruins of an ancient temple. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.Name: Ruined Sacred site
properties.Note: Ruins of an ancient sacred site. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.Name: Nulnulnulbu Library
properties.Note: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.Name: Travelling Incomprehensible Circus
properties.Note: Roll up, roll up, this incomprehensible circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.Name: Travelling Unmissable Circus
properties.Note: Roll up, roll up, this unmissable circus is here for a limited time only.

properties.Name: Yaztoptar Competition
properties.Note: Warriors from around the land gather for a competition of acumen in Yaztoptar, with fame, fortune and favour on offer to the victor.

properties.Name: Dewbaymouth Fair
properties.Note: A fair is being held in Dewbaymouth, with all manner of local and foreign goods and services on offer.

properties.Name: Minor Jetty
properties.Note: A small location along the Taynak Fork to launch boats from sits here, along with a weary looking owner, willing to sell passage along the river.

properties.Name: Larks migration
properties.Note: A huge group of larks are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.Name: Aurymouth celebration
properties.Note: A celebration has been organised at Aurymouth as a chance to gather the great and the good of the area together to be merry, make alliances and scheme around the crisis.

properties.Name: Perculiar mirage
properties.Note: This perculiar mirage has been luring travellers out of their way for eons.

properties.Name: Yakesen Sinkhole
properties.Note: The Yakesen Sinkhole. Locals claim that it is totally empty.

properties.Name: Maldrith Fracture
properties.Note: The Maldrith Fracture. Locals claim that it is the home of strange monsters.

properties.Name: Timercairn Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Mondwatch Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Kovaya Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Imeshand Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Lightlec Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Undizindus Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Ipji Portal
properties.Note: An element of the magic portal system connecting major cities. The portals were installed centuries ago, but still work fine.

properties.Name: Cosmic Rift
properties.Note: A rumoured cosmic rift in this area is causing cracks in reality itself to form.

properties.Name: Disturbed Burial
properties.Note: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.Name: Disturbed Burial
properties.Note: A burial site has been disturbed in this area, causing the dead to rise and attack the living.

properties.Name: Sahryrionat Necropolis
properties.Note: A labyrinthine necropolis where each step echoes with haunting murmurs. The walls are adorned with ancient runes, and restless spirits guide or hinder those who dare to delve into its depths.
